name: 楊仁傑
objective:
This course is an entry-level, application oriented, graduate course to lead students with basic understanding in finite element method and its applications. Several programming and software will be introduced. Students will practice and define their own engineering problems and use finite element method to solve them. Through home-works, project exercises, project discussions and presentations, students will be able to utilize the finite element method in their own researches.
本課程是入門級、應用為主的研究生課程，旨在引導學生對有限元方法及其應用有基本的瞭解。將介紹一些程式設計和軟體。學生將練習和定義自己的工程問題，並使用有限元法來解決。通過作業、專案練習、專案討論和發表，學生將能夠在自己的研究中運用有限元方法。
